page.title: 05ECOLOGY. WATER SUPPLY WILLEY
page.content: There is no mains water supply in the area. Sources of water are in 3 groups; SPRINGS At The Raft a spring by the stream below has a pump suppling Ashley Cottage, Willey Lane, & Lower House from a resevoir on the hill above. Cwm Crave water is from a spring on Fenlands property. Hicks Farm, Boresford, The Wordells, The Ridges & Goat House are all on nearby spring water.The spring at Willey Lodge moved 20 feet in the drought of 1984 and work costing Â£1000 was required to reconnect the supply. WELLS are at Red House, Marsh Farm, Old Hall, Willey House & Red House supplies bryfold Cottage. BOREHOLES are at Field Cottage & Upper House Brierley Hill.
